name: @apitraffic/fastify
description: Fastify plugin for sending request data to ApiTraffic.

scripts.pub-patch: npm version patch --force && git push origin master &&  npm publish --access public
scripts.pub-minor: npm version minor --force && git push origin master &&  npm publish --access public
scripts.pub-major: npm version major --force && git push origin master &&  npm publish --access public

author: ApiTraffic.io <sdk@apitraffic.io>
